title: From Polish constructivist manifesto 1923
content:
Dear Type ID Board,

this is a font from a Polish constructivist manifesto which was published in 1923. Any ideas what it could be?

Thanks!  
Saara

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020075426im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typo_utdrag_small_3577.jpg)
author: Saara

comments.content:
I would like to bump this... I am also looking for this exact typeface...

this is jess...

Weird, aside form the A's the other characters remind me of Korinna

Is it possible that this is the original Art Nouveau version of Korinna that Berthold released in 1904? Ed Benguiat based the ITC version on the Berthold's.
